New Superstring - Lyric video editor

New Superstring is here. It's a Mac & Windows app that lets you create great lyric videos easily. You can make your own lyric video and upload to YouTube in just 10 minutes.
Now show your music to the world!

What's new in Superstring 3.0.0:
  • Added beautiful, free photos
  • Added more effects
  • Added new fonts
  • Support .wav format
  • Performance increase
  • Stability improvements
  • Fixed minor issues

Available for Mac and Windows.
Click to download and install.
